page.title: 02Education Atlantic College
page.content: United World Colleges offer students of all races and religions the opportunity of developing international understanding by providing a programme for which the students need high academic qualifications and a sense of adventure and social responsibility. Atlantic College is the first of many United World Colleges.There are six altogether.These are situated at New Mexico,Trieste,Vancouver Island, Swaziland,St.Donats and Singapore. The idea behind these colleges came from Dr.Kurt Hahn and others who thought that the enormous loss of young life in two world wars was tragic.Their idea was to start a school for young people of all countries to attend,to learn to live together in peace and to take these ideas back to their own countries.
